TopicTitle: Site/forum down for me minutes ago !

Articles.Content: I hope i post this in the right section. A few minutes ago i couldn\'t enter anymore the site and the forum. But than i could enter the site and the button 'forum' was gone (either i didn\'t look well or i need glasses). Than i could not anymore and now i can enter the site and forum. I don\'t blame the developers of this game, maybe is my pc fault. I hope no one would try something bad with the site >

A new version of KSP was released.

Generally the community gets so excited they overload the dev\'s servers.

Last time they took down the website to assist with downloads, I\'m not sure if they did that this time though.

In either case, if you find the website is unavailable, just assume a new version has been release. I think there\'s only been one case where they were attacked by some script kiddies.
Ok, thank for the answer, i taught after the events that something is amiss.
